result.title: 762C
result.content:
//%%%%10.1.3.24##3389%%%% //By venom0000

include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std; const int N = 1e5+10;

int stck[N], top=0; int la, lb; char a[N], b[N];

int main() { int i = 0; int ans=0, posL, posR; scanf("%s%s", a, b); stck[0] = -1; la = strlen(a); lb = strlen(b); posL = posR = -2; int L = 0; int R = la-1; while(L < la) { if(a[L] == b[i]) { stck[++top] = L; i ++; } L ++; }

// for(i=1; i<=top; i++) // printf("%d ", stck[i]); // puts("");

ans = top;
posL = top-1;
i = lb-1;
int cnt = 0;
while(R >= 0)
{
    if(a[R] == b[i])
    {
        cnt ++;
        i --;
    }
    while((R <= stck[top] || i<top) && top>0) ///注意细节！！！
        top --;
    R --;
    if(ans < top + cnt)
    {
        ans = top +cnt;
        posL = top-1;
        posR = cnt;
    }
    //printf("%d %d %d %d %d\n", i, R, cnt, top, ans);
}
if(ans == 0)
    puts("-");
//printf("%d %d %d\n", ans, posL, posR);
for(int j=0; j<=posL; j++)
    printf("%c", b[j]);
//printf(" ");
for(int j=lb-posR; j<lb; j++)
    printf("%c", b[j]);

// for(i=1; i<=top; i++) // printf("%d ", stck[i]);

return 0;

}
